text: Ihor Dmytrovych Reizlin (; born 7 December 1984) is a Ukrainian épée fencer, individual bronze medallist at 2019 World Fencing Championships, team bronze medallist at the 2009 Summer Universiade and team silver medallist in the 2010 European Fencing Championships. He won a bronze medal in the 2009 Heidenheim World Cup. He participated at the 2019 World Fencing Championships, winning a medal.2019 World Fencing Championships ranking ==References== ==External links== * *Profile at the European Fencing Confederation Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male fencers Category:Ukrainian épée fencers Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Ukraine Category:Medalists at the 2009 Summer Universiade Category:World Fencing Championships medalists
title: Ihor Reizlin
